list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an unbranched evergreen tree with a crown of long feathered or fan-shaped leaves, and typically having old leaf scars forming a regular pattern on the trunk. Palms grow in warm regions, especially the tropics.
the inner surface of the hand between the wrist and fingers.
conceal (a card or other small object) in the hand, especially as part of a trick or theft.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he would spin wild tales while palming your wristwatch
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy sẽ quay những câu chuyện hoang dã trong khi lòng bàn tay của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: hit (something) with the palm of the hand.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Jason palmed the ball out of danger
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Jason đặt bóng ra khỏi nguy hiểm
